content.text: I have only 4 hours in Copenhagen before my flight. What can I see nearby?
content.response: You can explore Nyhavn for its colorful harbor views and enjoy a quick canal tour. If time allows, walk to Amalienborg Palace to see the royal guards, or visit the Little Mermaid statue nearby. All are within a short distance!

content.text: I just landed in Rome with 3 hours before my next train. Any quick must-sees near Termini Station?
content.response: From Termini, you can visit the Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore, just a 10-minute walk away. Alternatively, take a short taxi ride to the Colosseum for iconic photos and quick exploration.

content.text: I have a 2-hour layover in Amsterdam. Can I do anything interesting without missing my flight?
content.response: Yes! If Schiphol Airport is your location, hop on a quick train to Amsterdam Central (15 minutes). Walk to the canals for scenic views, and if time permits, grab a coffee at a nearby café before returning.

content.text: I'm on a budget and have a free afternoon in Paris. What should I prioritize?
content.response: For a budget-friendly experience, take a stroll along the Seine River and visit landmarks like Notre-Dame Cathedral (free to explore the exterior). You can also enjoy the Tuileries Garden and snap photos of the Eiffel Tower from Trocadéro.
